subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Kevin De Bruyne and Andre Schürrle scored as Chelsea beat A.C. Milan, 2-0, in an International Champions Cup winners’ bracket game at MetLife Stadium in East Rutherford, N.J.
snippet: Kevin De Bruyne and Andre Schürrle scored as Chelsea beat A.C. Milan, 2-0, in an International Champions Cup winners’ bracket game at MetLife Stadium in East Rutherford, N.J.
